_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_IsExtractionInstance

5c825cfa-d291-4cf3-8c6b-4de803ee6781.name: AIA Classification Run Model Version

_a-0000ee21-294f-8000-9bb6-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_IsDocumentExtension

_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_HasCriticalErrors
_a-0000ee6e-3b90-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!relationship: if(
    rule!AIA_IsExtractionInstance(Instance: ri!Instance),
    recordType!AIA Extraction Instance.validations,
    recordType!AIA Classification Instance.validations
  ),
  local!criticalErrors: rule!AIA_UTIL_Filter(
    records: a!defaultValue(ri!Validations, ri!Instance[local!relationship]),
    field: recordType!AIA Instance Validation Error.severity,
    value: cons!AIA_SEVERITY_CRITICAL,
    filterType: "FILTER"
  ),
  and(
    a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      local!criticalErrors
    ),
    length(
      local!criticalErrors
    ) > 0
  )
)

_a-0000edd9-a94f-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Classification_ShouldRun

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_Filter
_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AIA_UTIL_Filter_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  )
)
